references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which are the basis for many of the image and video generation models discussed in the paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the high-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models, which is directly used and improved upon in the presented work.

references.paper_title: Pix2Video: Video editing using image diffusion
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it presents a method for video editing using image diffusion, which is closely related to the zero-shot video generation proposed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Text2Video-Zero: Text-to-image diffusion models are zero-shot video generators
references.reason: This paper is directly compared to and serves as a baseline for the proposed zero-shot video generation method.

references.paper_title: Imagen video: High definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-definition video generation model using diffusion models, which is relevant to the work presented here.
